metadata.title: CVE-2019-17452 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Bento4 1.5.1.0 has a NULL pointer dereference inAP4_DescriptorListInspector::Action in Core/Ap4Descriptor.h, related toAP4_IodsAtom::InspectFields in Core/Ap4IodsAtom.cpp, as demonstrated bymp4dump.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
